mapper.select: SELECT u.seq, u.email, u.password, u.nickName, u.delYn, u.profileCont, u.role FROM coc.user u WHERE 1=1 AND u.delYn = 'N';
SELECT u.seq, u.email, u.nickName, u.profileCont, u.role FROM coc.user u WHERE seq = #{seq}; AND u.delYn = 'N'
SELECT u.seq, u.email, u.password, u.nickName, u.delYn, u.profileCont, u.role FROM coc.user u WHERE email = #{email} AND u.delYn = 'N'
SELECT u.email, u.password FROM coc.user u WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password} AND u.delYn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coc.user ( createdAt, email, password, nickName, delYn, profileCont, role )VALUES ( SYSDATE(), #{email}, #{password}, #{nickName}, 'N', #{profileCont}, 'user' );
mapper.update: UPDATE coc.user SET updatedAt = SYSDATE(), email = #{email}, password = #{password}, nickName = #{nickName}, profileCont = #{profileCont}
mapper.delete: UPDATE coc.user SET delYn = 'Y', updatedAt = SYSDATE() WHERE seq = #{seq}
